name: Kaiju Kitty Prototype
description:
Inspired by games like Katamari Damacy and Untitled Goose Game, "Kaiju Kitty" is a game where you play as a cat that grows in size by knocking things over/off of high places!

This is a prototype I built in 10 days which is meant to help fund a full version via Kickstarter. If you're interested in supporting development, check out the Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/jakobwithac/kaiju-kitty
